Digital Media Courses

Exploring the creation of web-based digital media.

Web Development Taster 1.5 hours

Build a simple web page from the ground up using HTML and CSS.
Dynamic Designs with jQuery 3 hours

Learn how to add a slideshow and a pop-up image gallery to your website using jQuery plugins.
Building the Web 6 hours | Coming Soon

Learn the basics of web design by coding a live website containing photos and videos. Covers the basics of HTML and CSS.
Building with jQuery 6 hours | Coming Soon

Learn the basics of interactive web design by coding a bubble-popping game which is published as a live website.
